import{configureStore,createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";//받아오는 데이터//
var initialState={eventLoading:false,eventData:null,error:null};var eventSlice=createSlice({name:"events",initialState:initialState,reducers:{//suggestion
eventRequest:function eventRequest(state,_action){state.eventLoading=true;state.error=null;},eventSuccess:function eventSuccess(state,action){state.eventLoading=false;state.eventData=action.payload;},eventFailure:function eventFailure(state,action){state.eventLoading=true;state.error=action.payload;},// 수정필요(디테일 확인해야함)
addEventRequest:function addEventRequest(state,_action){state.eventLoading=true;state.error=null;},addEventSuccess:function addEventSuccess(state,action){state.eventLoading=false;state.eventData=action.payload;},addEventFailure:function addEventFailure(state,action){state.eventLoading=true;state.error=action.payload;},deleteEventRequest:function deleteEventRequest(state,_action){state.eventLoading=true;state.error=null;},deleteEventSuccess:function deleteEventSuccess(state,action){state.eventLoading=false;state.eventData=action.payload;},deleteEventFailure:function deleteEventFailure(state,action){state.eventLoading=true;state.error=action.payload;}}});var store=configureStore({reducer:{event:eventSlice.reducer}});var reducer=eventSlice.reducer,actions=eventSlice.actions;var eventRequest=actions.eventRequest,eventSuccess=actions.eventSuccess,eventFailure=actions.eventFailure,addEventRequest=actions.addEventRequest,addEventSuccess=actions.addEventSuccess,addEventFailure=actions.addEventFailure,deleteEventRequest=actions.deleteEventRequest,deleteEventSuccess=actions.deleteEventSuccess,deleteEventFailure=actions.deleteEventFailure;export{eventRequest,eventSuccess,eventFailure,addEventRequest,addEventSuccess,addEventFailure,deleteEventRequest,deleteEventSuccess,deleteEventFailure};export default reducer;
